title: Watch face - Cat
summary: Super kawaii & sweet Android Wear watch face.7 funny postures of Cat ! Try it !

descriptionHTML:
Features:

-New modern kawaii Android Wear watch face.

-Super cute design style of Cat.

-Animations of cat and fish are changed daily.

-Support both round and square watches.

This lovely watch face you must have one

What would your prefect life look like? For Miss kitty, she prefers to have plenty of fish and lie on the grass just under the sun. Look there, the lovely girl is wagging her tail and singing right now “meow~w~meow~~~”.

Definitely different than Facer or Ticker, this is the cutest Android Wear watchface unlike any one you have used before.





Supported Devices:

Cat supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

How to use Cat:

-Install the app from Google Play.
-Open the Android Wear APP of your phone and select “resync apps”in settings.
-Then you could try to select it from Android wear APP , or to long-press your smart watch to choose Cat .

Note:

Please rate us positive if you like our watch face.
Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.

Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.com
Seeing more details please refer the below “Contact us”

Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.


Tips:

✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)
✔ If the face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:

1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).
2. Uninstall the watch face.
3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.
4. Finally install the watch face and select “resync apps” in settings

Attention:
- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.

More magic faces:
Feel free to check out our more watch face collections:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=magic+watchface

Contact us:
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
magicwatchface@gmail.com

And more coming ways to find us:
Instagram, Pinterest...

Thank you for :
We really appreciate for you downloading our apps. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
comments: more options please i like this watch face but it needs more options! such as how often the cat changes activites.  i wanted it to be hourly not daily :(
Great until low bit mode kicks in. Any chance for update to support Zenwatch? Pretty unusable in always on ambient mode
What update Love this face but update claims change face direction and hands direction, yet there are NO setting to do this. So lose a star.
So cute Adorable. Looks like there's an option for a black background on this watch face but I can't access it.
Cute A bit low res, but otherwise good. Please make a dog version üòÑ.
It is cute no issues It has no issues running
recentChanges: adjust the direction of cat and clock hands
